name: Ranma 1/2: III Anything Goes Martial Arts
summary: Ranma 1/2: Chougi Ranbu Hen is an Action game, developed by Atelier Double and published by Shogakukan, which was released in Japan in 1994.This game was supposed to be released in the USA as "Anything Goes Martial Arts" as the sequel to Hard Battle, but the company that owned the rights for it went out of business.Eventually, that game got cancelled after the incident. This is the only game to feature Mariko Konjo and Herb.
